The sermons of bishop Conybeare in the second volume are amongst the single sermons published in his lifetime, and are not contained in the two volumes printed by subscription after his death.

It may require some apology perhaps that I have added a work so purely controversial, and full of personal satire, as “ Dr. Bentley’s Remarks on Free— “ Thinking :⁹⁹ but the many just observations it con- tains, the ready and clear solution which it gives of several difficulties of great moment, (as for instance, of that concerning the various readings of the New Testament3) and the spirit of sound criticism and true learning which goes through the whole, seem
